omopColumns.name: NhsNumber
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		DateofDeath
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
where DateofDeath is not null
order by
	NHSNumber,
	DateofDeath

omopColumns.name: death_date
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		NHSNumber,
		DateofDeath
from omop_staging.oxford_gp_demographic
where DateofDeath is not null
order by
	NHSNumber,
	DateofDeath
